Name: Astro Fighters 2178
About the game: Earth has been destroyed and humanity has discovered a new planet that could support life Take to your ship to fend off an attack from alien forces and ensure the survival of the human race! Upgrade your ship to advance further through the game with permanent upgrades increase your chance of success. Featuring 16 level of intense action and multiple boss battles. Over 20 upgrade options to customize your ship Single and Co-Op Multiplayer
